name: RenderEmailTemplateBodyResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurred during the renderEmailTemplate method, a RenderEmailTemplateError object is returned.

methods.name: getMergedBody
methods.description: Returns the rendered body text with merge field references replaced with the corresponding record data.

methods.name: getSuccess
methods.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

description: Contains the results for rendering email templates.
